title: Automatically generate screenshots, opengraph images and more for your websites
author: hbakhtiyor
content: readme.md can follow on twitter subscribe our newsletter upcoming updates.api generating thumbnails captured screenshots websites./v1/thumbs/namedefaultaccepted valuedescriptionurl valid urlstarget url (required), http(s):// prefix is optionaloutputrawraw, jsonoutput format (raw, json)prettifyfalse boolean valuesprettify json outputformatjpgjpg, jpeg, pngimage format (jpg, png)quality1001..100image qualityfullfalse boolean valuescapture full pagesizet, s, m, l, x, og size the thumbnail. available predefined sizes: t - tiny (90x68), s - small (120x90), m - medium (200x150), l - large (400x300), x - extra large (480x360), og - recommended image size facebook's open graph protocol (1200x630)width3201..16383 width the thumbnailheight240 (mobile: 568)1..16383 height the thumbnailmobilefalse boolean valueswhether emulate mobile device. includes viewport meta tag, overlay scrollbars, text autosizing moredevice the below listpredefined user agent, viewport width & height, ...viewportwidth1200 (mobile: 412)1..1600 viewport width the pageviewportheight1200 (mobile: 732)1..1600 viewport height the pageuseragent valid user agents yet implementeddelay0..10 yet implementedmore options? open issueexample (command line):$ curl -s https://api.letsvalidate.com/v1/thumbs?url=kontaktify.com > kontaktify.jpgexample (web browser):https://api.letsvalidate.com/v1/thumbs/?url=kontaktify.com result: example (json output):https://api.letsvalidate.com/v1/thumbs/?url=kontaktify.com&output=json result:{"mime_type": "image/jpeg","base64": "","width": 320,"height": 240}example using og size the following html code.<!-- put additional og tags here --><meta property="og:image" content="https://api.letsvalidate.com/v1/thumbs?url=kontaktify.com&size=og" /><!-- same image works twitter card --><!-- put additional twitter card tags here --><meta name="twitter:card" content="summary_large_image"><meta name="twitter:image" content="https://api.letsvalidate.com/v1/thumbs?url=kontaktify.com&size=og" /> list accepted devices: analyzing technologies websites./v1/technologies/nametypedefaultdescriptionurlstringtarget url (required), http(s):// prefix is optionalprettifybooleanfalseprettify json outputexample:https://api.letsvalidate.com/v1/technologies/?url=kontaktify.com result:{"url": "https://www.kontaktify.com","originalurl": "http://kontaktify.com","applications": [{"name": "buysellads","confidence": "100","version": "","icon": "buysellads.png","website": "http://buysellads.com","categories": ["advertising networks"]}, {"name": "carbon ads","confidence": "100","version": "","icon": "carbon ads.png","website": "http://carbonads.net","categories": ["advertising networks"]}, {"name": "cloudflare","confidence": "100","version": "","icon": "cloudflare.svg","website": "hotjar.png","website": "https://www.hotjar.com","categories": ["analytics"]}, {"name": "kontaktify","confidence": "100","version": "","icon": "kontaktify.png","website": {"name": "react","confidence": "100","version": "","icon": "react.png","website": "http://facebook.github.io/react","categories": ["javascript frameworks"]}, {"name": "twitter","confidence": bootstrap.png","website": "http://getbootstrap.com","categories": ["web frameworks"]}, {"name": "zepto","confidence": "100","version": "","icon": "zepto.png","website": "http://zeptojs.com","categories": ["javascript frameworks"]}]}notes current api rate limit is 100/1 calls/minute per client's ip address. generated thumbnails be host cloudflare cdn serve https, without watermarks.internally use wappalyzer analyzing technologies websites.currently accessing apis need keys. thumbnailing handles modern websites.using headless chrome capturing screenshots.
